traits.name: Ice Walk
entries: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, {@quickref difficult terrain||3} composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8 damage) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
